title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4022 - The Stewards
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4022

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101[1], 104[1], [19], 128, 250, 301[1], 310, 401[1], 410; L. 1934, ch. 310, as amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
